flawed_nl_solution:
After this week, Michelangelo will have 28-12=<<28-12=11>>11 more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint 12/4=<<12/4=3>>3 ceilings.
Michelangelo will have 11-3=<<11-3=8>>8 more ceilings to paint.
#### 8

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
